comment.author: 15798704@N00
comment._content: I have an ongoing project (brand new, of course), started in an effort to help restore the color to these images, but also try to maintain the integrity and charm of the original. Here is the adjusted photo: www.flickr.com/photos/alec_fredericks/2200692261/ And the set: www.flickr.com/photos/alec_fredericks/sets/72157603732346...

comment.author: 45791749@N00
comment._content:
No way to see the images you mention, unfortunately.  It says: "The photo you were looking for has been deleted. You might like to ask ACFred about it!"

I've been looking at these images over a few days and have had the strange sensation that I'm being a voyeur: I've never felt that before.
